Articles.Content: Hello Kerbonauts,Developers,and so forth,i have been looking for links to "Heavy Lifters" as you call them (.craft files,stock,for .16) and the link and a guide to,"MechJeb" to test it's capability,all the links i have found are broken,and just redirect me back to home page of the forum,thanks,and thanks again.

Hi Ukz0, welcome to the community

All the old links were broken by the move to vBulletin, but the MechJeb system can be found in the Plugin powered add-on releases board, vessels can be found in the Spacecraft Exchange, you may have to do a bit of scrolling or you can try the search box in the top right.

I can't help with the craft but MechJeb is here
